verses.roman:
tāte jāni,--kona tapasyāra āche bala
ayogyere deoyāya kṛṣṇādharāmṛta-phala

synonyms: tāte—therefore; jāni—I can understand; kona—some; tapasyāra—of austerity; āche—there is; bala—strength; ayogyere—unto the unfit; deoyāya—delivers; kṛṣṇa-adhara-amṛta—the nectar of Kṛṣṇa's lips; phala—the result.
translation: "It is therefore to be understood that such an unfit person must have obtained the nectar of Kṛṣṇa's lips on the strength of some austerity."
